languages.text: "Он будет недоволен, что на его владения покусились, и попытается их вернуть. А недовольство Каллигоса Винтерскейла — очень... опасный феномен. Начнется борьба двух Вольных Торговцев, и, как это ни смешно, исход ее скорее всего будет зависеть от лояльности скромного Наместника станции".

traits.locale_text: "Он будет недоволен, что на его владения покусились, и попытается их вернуть. А недовольство Каллигоса Винтерскейла — очень... опасный феномен. Начнется борьба двух Вольных Торговцев, и, как это ни смешно, исход ее скорее всего будет зависеть от лояльности скромного наместника станции".

languages.text: "He will be displeased upon finding his demesne encroached upon and will try to take it back. And Calligos Winterscale's displeasure is a very... very hazardous phenomenon. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."
languages.original_text: "Он будет недоволен, что на его владения покусились, и попытается их вернуть. А недовольство Каллигоса Винтерскейла — очень... опасный феномен. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."

languages.text: 「あの方はご自分の領地が奪われたと分かれば、ムッとして取り戻そうとするだろう。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールがご立腹されれば非常に…非常に危険な事態だ。ふたりの自由開拓者の間で戦いが勃発することになる。馬鹿馬鹿しく聞こえるかもしれないが、戦いの結果はおそらく、ステーションの慎ましいリージュの忠誠にかかっているだろう」
languages.original_text: "He will be displeased upon finding his demesne encroached upon and will try to take it back. And Calligos Winterscale's displeasure is a very... very hazardous phenomenon. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."

traits.locale_text: 「あの方はご自分の領地が奪われたと分かれば、ムッとして取り戻そうとするだろう。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールがご立腹されれば非常に…非常に危険な事態だ。ふたりの自由開拓者の間で戦いが勃発することになる。馬鹿馬鹿しく聞こえるかもしれないが、戦いの結果はおそらく、ステーションの慎ましいリージュの忠誠にかかっているだろう」

languages.text: “如果卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔发现他的领地遭到了侵犯，他会非常愤怒，打算把它夺回来。一旦他发起了脾气，那恐怕会非常……非常危险。到那个时候，两位行商浪人之间的斗争将在所难免。尽管这听起来很荒谬，但若是真的打起来，那场战争的结果，恐怕会取决于我这位卑微的总督对谁更加忠诚。”
languages.original_text: "He will be displeased upon finding his demesne encroached upon and will try to take it back. And Calligos Winterscale's displeasure is a very... very hazardous phenomenon. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."

traits.locale_text: “如果卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔发现他的领地遭到了侵犯，他会非常愤怒，打算把它夺回来。一旦他发起了脾气，那恐怕会非常……非常危险。到那个时候，两位行商浪人之间的斗争将在所难免。尽管这听起来很荒谬，但若是真的打起来，那场战争的结果，恐怕会取决于我这位卑微的总督对谁更加忠诚。”

languages.text: «Se escandalizará al ver invadido su territorio y tratará de recuperarlo. Cuando algo no es del gusto de Calligos Winterscale, se ha de tener mucho... mucho cuidado. Estaremos ante una disputa entre Comerciantes Independientes y, por ridículo que parezca, su resultado dependerá probablemente de la lealtad del humilde Señor de la estación».
languages.original_text: "He will be displeased upon finding his demesne encroached upon and will try to take it back. And Calligos Winterscale's displeasure is a very... very hazardous phenomenon. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."

traits.locale_text: «Se escandalizará al ver invadido su territorio y tratará de recuperarlo. Cuando algo no es del gusto de Calligos Winterscale, se ha de tener mucho... mucho cuidado. Estaremos ante una disputa entre Comerciantes Independientes y, por ridículo que parezca, su resultado dependerá probablemente de la lealtad del humilde Señor de la estación».

languages.text: « Il serait fort mécontent de voir que quelqu'un a tenté d'accaparer son territoire et ferait tout pour le reprendre. Et quand Calligos Winterscale est mécontent... il vaut mieux se mettre rapidement à l'abri. Il s'ensuivrait un combat entre deux libres-marchands dont l'issue ne dépendrait sans doute que de l'allégeance de l'humble suzerain de la station, aussi ridicule que cela puisse paraître. »
languages.original_text: "He will be displeased upon finding his demesne encroached upon and will try to take it back. And Calligos Winterscale's displeasure is a very... very hazardous phenomenon. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."

traits.locale_text: « Il serait fort mécontent de voir que quelqu'un a tenté d'accaparer son territoire et ferait tout pour le reprendre. Et quand Calligos Winterscale est mécontent... il vaut mieux se mettre rapidement à l'abri. Il s'ensuivrait un combat entre deux libres-marchands dont l'issue ne dépendrait sans doute que de l'allégeance de l'humble suzerain de la station, aussi ridicule que cela puisse paraître. »

languages.text: "Er wird über Eure Übernahme seines Territoriums nicht erfreut sein und versuchen, es sich zurückzuholen. Und der Missmut von Calligos Winterzunder ist ein sehr ... sehr gefährliches Phänomen. Es wird zum Konflikt zwischen zwei Freihändlern kommen, und so lächerlich das klingen mag, dessen Ausgang wird wahrscheinlich von der Loyalität des bescheidenen Lehnsherren der Station abhängen."
languages.original_text: "He will be displeased upon finding his demesne encroached upon and will try to take it back. And Calligos Winterscale's displeasure is a very... very hazardous phenomenon. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."

traits.locale_text: "Er wird über Eure Übernahme seines Territoriums nicht erfreut sein und versuchen, es sich zurückzuholen. Und der Missmut von Calligos Winterzunder ist ein sehr ... sehr gefährliches Phänomen. Es wird zum Konflikt zwischen zwei Freihändlern kommen, und so lächerlich das klingen mag, dessen Ausgang wird wahrscheinlich von der Loyalität des bescheidenen Lehnsherren der Station abhängen."

languages.text: "Egemenlik alanının ihlal edildiğini görünce hoşnut olmayacak ve geri almaya çalışacak ki Calligos Winterscale'in hoşnutsuzluğu çok... Çok tehlikelidir. İki Hür Tacir arasında mücadele yaşanacak ve sonucu, kulağa ne kadar saçma gelse de büyük olasılıkla istasyonun mütevazı Emîr'inin kime biat edeceğine bağlı olacak."
languages.original_text: "He will be displeased upon finding his demesne encroached upon and will try to take it back. And Calligos Winterscale's displeasure is a very... very hazardous phenomenon. A fight between two Rogue Traders will ensue, and, as ridiculous as it may sound, its outcome will most likely depend on the allegiance of the station's humble Liege."

traits.locale_text: "Egemenlik alanına tecavüz edildiğini görünce hoşnut olmayacak ve geri almaya çalışacak ki Calligos Winterscale'in hoşnutsuzluğu çok... Çok tehlikelidir. İki Hür Tacir arasında bir mücadele yaşanacak ve sonucu, kulağa ne kadar saçma gelse de büyük olasılıkla istasyonun mütevazı Emîr'inin kime biat edeceğine bağlı olacak."
